name: ENERGEAN OIL & GAS PLC
goal:
Energean is an independent E&P company focused on developing resources in the Eastern Mediterranean, where it holds 13 licenses and operates assets with a production track record of more than 37 years.

For more information please refer to our site:
www.energean.com
euInitiatives: We are focusing on policies, initiatives and legislative files in relation to the Energy sector, but we have not yet actively supported a certain initiative.
